page.title: 13Traffic in Gotherington
page.content: Although Gotherington is a fairly small village it has quite a busy road passing through it which links the village to Winchcombe, Cheltenham, Tewkesbury and Evesham. Most of the traffic is through traffic. Commuters to work provide the bulk of this traffic in the early mornings and evenings.In a recent survey carried out by the local school over a period of three days it was found that approximately 80 vehicles per hour pass through the village between 8am and 6pm.Most of these vehicles were private cars although there were a few lorries,vans,motorbikes and tractors included in this total.Traffic passes by a various speeds as there is no speed limit in the village. This makes it particularly hazardous for pedestrians as does the absence of street lighting.
